name: Frost Shatter
description:
-Controls-

WASD / Left Stick - Movement;

Shift / East Button - Fast Movement;

Space  / North Button - Speed Boost;

F / West Button - Examine and Interact;

-Story-

Expedition: FrostShatter...
You're on board the capital ship Zelotzich. Your mission is to explore a frozen planet and conduct experiments on it. As your fleet approaches the lower orbit of this frozen planet, mayhem is unleashed.

Multiple planetary weapons open fire on your fleet and destroy them in seconds. All escape pods and shuttles are launched as everything fails. You are in one of these escape pods... This is where your story begins.

You are C-01, an experimental new robot that is still being researched. Your one and only objective is to escape from this frozen planet. However, there are others with their own missions. 

You're not stranded alone here, with everyone losing everything things have gone unstable. Your companion K.A.T.E wants to rescue you and escape as well, but she also has the objective to collect research data on you and this planet. There will be others with their own goals, It's your choice if you want to help them.

Will you take the shortest path to escape and fulfill your mission?
Or will you help others with their missions and delay your escape?
